title: Pu`ukoholƒÅ Heiau National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         A visitor enjoying a double-hulled canoe ride at the Park's annual Hawaiian Cultural Festival. NPS  Interpretive Programs Walking Tours Ranger Talks Living History Tour Cell Phone Audio Tour Cultural Demonstrations Educational Tours Children's Programs Junior Ranger Programs Scout Ranger Programs Special Programs Cultural Demonstration of Hawaiian Crafts are offered at various times throughout the year. - Call for times and details Annual Hawaiian Cultural Festival Safety For your safety stay on the trails and do not climb on archaeological structures. If you are not physically fit and dressed properly, do not attempt the hike.
